document.full_text: federal authorities arrested 12 people on thursday, including 10 current or former delta air lines baggage handlers, in an internal probe of drug smuggling at detroit metro airport, a federal spokesman said.
document.title: feds arrest 12 in detroit airport drug smuggling probe
lines_and_colors: federal authorities arrested 12 people on thursday, including 10 current or former delta air lines baggage handlers, in an internal probe of drug smuggling at detroit metro airport, a federal spokesman said.
